# Kampsy UI Component Library

A Svelte 5 component library inspired by Vercel's Geist, designed to provide consistent and cohesive web experiences.

## Installation

```bash
pnpm i -D kampsy-ui@latest
```

### Tailwind Configuration

```javascript
import kampsyUI from 'kampsy-ui/preset';

/** @type {import('tailwindcss').Config} */
export default {
  presets: [kampsyUI]
}
```

## Components

### Avatar

**Exports:**
- `Avatar` - Main avatar component
- `AvatarGroup` - Group of avatars
- `AvatarText` - Text-based avatar components (Root, Heading, Subheading, Content)

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Avatar, AvatarGroup, AvatarText } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Avatar Group
const members = [
  { name: 'Evil Rabbit', imageLink: 'https://vercel.com/api/www/avatar?u=evilrabbit&s=64' },
  { name: 'Evil Rabbit', imageLink: 'https://vercel.com/api/www/avatar?u=sambecker&s=64' }
];

<AvatarGroup members={members.slice(0, 3)} size={32} />
<AvatarGroup limit={4} {members} size={32} />

// Avatar Text
<AvatarText.Root size={40}>
  <AvatarText.Content>
    <AvatarText.Heading>Jese Leos</AvatarText.Heading>
    <AvatarText.Subheading>Joined in August 2014</AvatarText.Subheading>
  </AvatarText.Content>
</AvatarText.Root>

// Avatar Placeholder
<Avatar placeholder size={90} />
```

### Badge

**Exports:**
- `Badge` - Badge component for labels and tags

**Props:**
- `variant`: 'gray' | 'gray-subtle' | 'blue' | 'blue-subtle' | 'purple' | 'purple-subtle' | 'amber' | 'amber-subtle' | 'red' | 'red-subtle' | 'pink' | 'pink-subtle' | 'green' | 'green-subtle' | 'teal' | 'teal-subtle' | 'inverted' | 'pill' (default: 'gray')
- `size`: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' (default: 'medium')
- `icon`: Component | undefined - Optional icon component
- `class`: string - Additional CSS classes
- Extends `HTMLAnchorAttributes`

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Badge } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { Shield } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

// Basic badge
<Badge variant="gray">gray</Badge>
<Badge variant="blue-subtle">blue-subtle</Badge>

// Sizes
<Badge size="small">small</Badge>
<Badge size="medium">medium</Badge>
<Badge size="large">large</Badge>

// With icon
<Badge icon={Shield} size="large" variant="gray">gray</Badge>

// Pill variant
<Badge href="/badge#pill" size="small" variant="pill">label</Badge>
<Badge href="/badge#pill" icon={LogoSlackColor} size="large" variant="pill">label</Badge>
```

### Button

**Exports:**
- `Button` - Button component

**Props:**
- `shape`: 'circle' | 'square' | undefined
- `size`: 'tiny' | 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' (default: 'medium')
- `variant`: 'primary' | 'secondary' | 'tertiary' | 'error' | 'warning' (default: 'primary')
- `iconPrefix`: Component | undefined - Icon component to show before text
- `iconSuffix`: Component | undefined - Icon component to show after text
- `rounded`: boolean (default: false) - Fully rounded button
- `loading`: boolean (default: false) - Shows loading spinner
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- `buttonElement`: HTMLButtonElement - Bindable reference to button element
- `onclick`: (evt: Event) => void - Click handler
- `class`: string - Additional CSS classes
- Extends `HTMLButtonAttributes`

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Button } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { ArrowLeft, ArrowRight, ArrowUp } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

// Sizes
<Button size="tiny">upload</Button>
<Button size="small">upload</Button>
<Button>upload</Button> <!-- medium default -->
<Button size="large">upload</Button>

// Variants
<Button variant="secondary">upload</Button>
<Button variant="tertiary">upload</Button>
<Button variant="error">upload</Button>
<Button variant="warning">upload</Button>

// Shapes (square/circle)
<Button shape="square" size="tiny">
  <div class="w-[16px] h-[16px]">
    <ArrowUp />
  </div>
</Button>
<Button shape="circle" size="large">
  <div class="w-[16px] h-[16px]">
    <ArrowUp />
  </div>
</Button>

// With icons
<Button iconPrefix={ArrowLeft}>upload</Button>
<Button iconSuffix={ArrowRight}>upload</Button>
<Button iconPrefix={ArrowLeft} iconSuffix={ArrowRight}>upload</Button>

// Rounded
<Button rounded>upload</Button>

// Loading state
<Button loading>upload</Button>

// Disabled
<Button disabled>upload</Button>
```

### Calendar

**Exports:**
- `Calendar` - Calendar component
- `Weekday` - Weekday component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Calendar } from 'kampsy-ui';
import type { DateValue, RangeValue } from 'kampsy-ui';

let value = $state<DateValue | RangeValue<DateValue>>();

<Calendar bind:value />
```

### Checkbox

**Exports:**
- `Checkbox` - Checkbox input component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Checkbox } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic
let value = $state(false);
<Checkbox bind:checked aria-labelledby="checkbox">option 1</Checkbox>

// Disabled states
<Checkbox disabled>Disabled</Checkbox>
<Checkbox checked disabled>Disabled Checked</Checkbox>
<Checkbox disabled indeterminate>Disabled Indeterminate</Checkbox>

// Indeterminate
<Checkbox indeterminate>option 1</Checkbox>

// Multiple items
let items = $state(['avatar', 'choicebox']);
<Checkbox value="avatar" bind:items>avatar</Checkbox>
<Checkbox value="button" bind:items>button</Checkbox>
<Checkbox value="calendar" bind:items>calendar</Checkbox>
```

### Choicebox

**Exports:**
- `Choicebox.Group` - Group container for choice items
- `Choicebox.Item` - Individual choice item

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Choicebox } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Radio (single select)
let value: string | string[] = $state('');
<Choicebox.Group label="select a plan" type="radio" bind:value>
  <Choicebox.Item defaultChecked description="Free for two weeks" title="Pro Trial" value="trial" />
  <Choicebox.Item description="Get started now" title="Pro" value="pro" />
</Choicebox.Group>

// Checkbox (multi-select)
let value: string | string[] = $state([]);
<Choicebox.Group label="select a plan" type="checkbox" bind:value>
  <Choicebox.Item description="Free for two weeks" title="Pro Trial" value="trial" />
  <Choicebox.Item description="Get started now" title="Pro" value="pro" />
</Choicebox.Group>

// Disabled
<Choicebox.Group label="select a plan" disabled type="radio" bind:value>
  <Choicebox.Item description="Free for two weeks" title="Pro Trial" value="trial" />
  <Choicebox.Item description="Get started now" title="Pro" value="pro" />
</Choicebox.Group>
```

### Collapse

**Exports:**
- `Collapse.Root` - Root container for collapsible content
- `Collapse.Item` - Collapsible item
- `Collapse.Trigger` - Trigger button to toggle collapse
- `Collapse.Content` - Collapsible content area
- `CollapseCode` - Code-specific collapse component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Collapse } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic collapse
<Collapse.Root>
  <Collapse.Item value="tab1">
    <Collapse.Trigger role="heading" aria-level={3} type="button" aria-controls="tab1-section" aria-expanded="false">
      Question A
    </Collapse.Trigger>
    <Collapse.Content id="tab1-section" aria-hidden="true" aria-labelledby="tab1">
      Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit...
    </Collapse.Content>
  </Collapse.Item>
</Collapse.Root>

// Expanded by default
<Collapse.Item defaultExpanded value="tab2">
  <Collapse.Trigger>Question B</Collapse.Trigger>
  <Collapse.Content>Content here</Collapse.Content>
</Collapse.Item>

// Multiple items expanded
<Collapse.Root multiple>
  <Collapse.Item value="tab1">...</Collapse.Item>
  <Collapse.Item defaultExpanded value="tab2">...</Collapse.Item>
</Collapse.Root>

// Size
<Collapse.Item size="small" value="tab1">...</Collapse.Item>
```

### Code

**Exports:**
- `CodeSnip` - Code snippet component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { CodeSnip } from 'kampsy-ui';
```

### Description

**Exports:**
- `Description` - Description text component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Description } from 'kampsy-ui';

<Description
  content="Data about this section."
  title="Section Title"
  tooltip="Additional context about what this section refers to."
/>
```

### EmptyState

**Exports:**
- `EmptyState.Root` - Empty state container component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { EmptyState, Button, ChartBarPeak } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic empty state
<EmptyState.Root
  description="A message conveying the state of the product."
  icon={ChartBarPeak}
  title="Title"
/>

// With action
<EmptyState.Root
  description="This should detail the actions you can take on this screen, as well as why it's valuable."
  icon={ChartBarPeak}
  title="Title"
>
  <Button variant="secondary">Primary Action</Button>
</EmptyState.Root>
```

### Error

**Exports:**
- `Error` - Error display component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Error } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic error
<Error>
  This email address is already in use.
</Error>

// With custom label
<Error label="Email Error">
  This email address is already in use.
</Error>

// Sizes
<Error size="sm">This email is in use.</Error>
<Error size="md">This email is in use.</Error>
<Error size="lg">This email is in use.</Error>

// With error object
<Error
  error={{
    message: 'The request failed.',
    action: 'Contact Us',
    link: 'https://ui.kampsy.xyz/error'
  }}
/>
```

### Input

**Exports:**
- `Input` - Text input component
- `SearchInput` - Search-specific input component

**Input Props:**
- `name`: string | undefined
- `value`: string (bindable, default: '')
- `label`: string | undefined
- `error`: string | undefined - Error message to display
- `size`: 'small' | 'medium' | 'large' (default: 'medium')
- `contPrefix`: string | Component | undefined - Prefix content (text or icon)
- `prefixStyling`: boolean (default: true) - Apply styling to prefix
- `contSuffix`: string | Component | undefined - Suffix content (text or icon)
- `suffixStyling`: boolean (default: true) - Apply styling to suffix
- `spellcheck`: boolean (default: false)
- `placeholder`: string | undefined
- `disabled`: boolean (default: false)
- Extends `HTMLAttributes<HTMLInputElement>`

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Input, SearchInput } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { ArrowCircleUp } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

// Basic input
let value = $state('');
<Input bind:value placeholder="default" />
<Input bind:value placeholder="small" size="small" />
<Input bind:value placeholder="large" size="large" />

// With prefix/suffix (icon)
<Input contPrefix={ArrowCircleUp} bind:value placeholder="default" />
<Input contSuffix={ArrowCircleUp} bind:value placeholder="default" />

// With prefix/suffix (text)
<Input contPrefix="https://" contSuffix=".com" bind:value placeholder="default" />

// Without styling on prefix/suffix
<Input
  contPrefix={ArrowCircleUp}
  prefixStyling={false}
  contSuffix={ArrowCircleUp}
  suffixStyling={false}
  placeholder="default"
/>

// Disabled
<Input placeholder="Disabled" disabled />
<Input value="Disabled with value" disabled />

// With error
<Input error="An error message." placeholder="long-error@gmail.com" />

// With label
<Input label="Label" bind:value placeholder="Label" />

// Search input
<SearchInput placeholder="Enter some text..." />
```

### Keyboard Input (Kbd)

**Exports:**
- `Kbd.Root` - Root keyboard input display
- `Kbd.Group` - Group of keyboard inputs

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Kbd } from 'kampsy-ui';

<Kbd.Group>
  <Kbd.Root>⌘</Kbd.Root>
  <Kbd.Root>⇧</Kbd.Root>
  <Kbd.Root>⌥</Kbd.Root>
  <Kbd.Root>⌃</Kbd.Root>
</Kbd.Group>
```

### Menu

**Exports:**
- `Menu.Root` - Root menu container
- `Menu.Button` - Menu trigger button
- `Menu.Content` - Menu dropdown content
- `Menu.Item` - Menu item
- `Menu.Link` - Menu link item

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Menu } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { MoreHorizontal, Accessibility } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

// Basic menu
<Menu.Root>
  <Menu.Button aria-controls="menu" aria-expanded="false" aria-haspopup="true">Actions</Menu.Button>
  <Menu.Content id="menu" aria-hidden="true" class="w-[200px]">
    <Menu.Item onClick={() => console.log('One')}>One</Menu.Item>
    <Menu.Item onClick={() => console.log('Two')}>Two</Menu.Item>
    <Menu.Link href="https://ui.kampsy.xyz">Test for Link</Menu.Link>
    <Menu.Item onClick={() => console.log('Delete')} type="error">Delete</Menu.Item>
  </Menu.Content>
</Menu.Root>

// With prefix/suffix icons
<Menu.Root>
  <Menu.Button shape="square" size="small" type="secondary">
    <div class="w-[16px] h-[16px]">
      <MoreHorizontal />
    </div>
  </Menu.Button>
  <Menu.Content class="w-[200px]">
    <Menu.Item prefix={Accessibility}>Left</Menu.Item>
    <Menu.Item suffix={Accessibility}>Right</Menu.Item>
  </Menu.Content>
</Menu.Root>

// Alignment
<Menu.Root alignment="right">
  <Menu.Button>Actions</Menu.Button>
  <Menu.Content class="w-[200px]">
    <Menu.Item>Item</Menu.Item>
  </Menu.Content>
</Menu.Root>
```

### Modal

**Exports:**
- `Modal.Root` - Root modal container
- `Modal.Body` - Modal body content
- `Modal.Content` - Modal content wrapper
- `Modal.Header` - Modal header
- `Modal.Title` - Modal title
- `Modal.Subtitle` - Modal subtitle
- `Modal.Footer` - Modal footer
- `Modal.Action` - Modal action button

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Modal, Button, Text } from 'kampsy-ui';

let active = $state(false);

// Basic modal
<Button onclick={() => (active = true)} size="small">Open Modal</Button>
<Modal.Root bind:active>
  <Modal.Content>
    <Modal.Body>
      <Modal.Header>
        <Modal.Title>Create Token</Modal.Title>
        <Modal.Subtitle>
          Enter a unique name for your token to differentiate it from other tokens and then select the scope.
        </Modal.Subtitle>
      </Modal.Header>
      <Text size={14}>Some content contained within the modal.</Text>
    </Modal.Body>
    <Modal.Footer>
      <Button onclick={() => (active = false)} type="secondary">Cancel</Button>
      <Button onclick={() => (active = false)}>Submit</Button>
    </Modal.Footer>
  </Modal.Content>
</Modal.Root>

// Sticky footer (for long content)
<Modal.Root bind:active sticky>
  <Modal.Content>
    <Modal.Body>
      <Modal.Header>
        <Modal.Title>Create Token</Modal.Title>
      </Modal.Header>
      {#each Array(40) as _, i}
        <Text size={14}>Some content contained within the modal.</Text>
      {/each}
    </Modal.Body>
    <Modal.Footer>
      <Button onclick={() => (active = false)} type="secondary">Cancel</Button>
      <Button onclick={() => (active = false)}>Submit</Button>
    </Modal.Footer>
  </Modal.Content>
</Modal.Root>

// Single button footer
<Modal.Footer>
  <Button onclick={() => (active = false)} type="secondary" class="w-full">Cancel</Button>
</Modal.Footer>

// Disabled actions
<Modal.Footer>
  <Button onclick={() => (active = false)} type="secondary">Cancel</Button>
  <Button disabled onclick={() => (active = false)}>Submit</Button>
</Modal.Footer>
```

### Note

**Exports:**
- `Note` - Note/alert component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Note, Button } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic note
<Note size="small">A small note</Note>
<Note>A default note</Note>
<Note size="large">A large note</Note>

// With action
{#snippet actionSnip()}
  <Button size="small">Upgrade</Button>
{/snippet}
<Note action={actionSnip}>This note details some information.</Note>

// Types
<Note type="success">Success information.</Note>
<Note type="error">Error information.</Note>
<Note type="warning">Warning information.</Note>
<Note type="secondary">Secondary information.</Note>
<Note type="violet">Violet information.</Note>
<Note type="cyan">Cyan information.</Note>

// Fill variant
<Note fill type="success">Success information.</Note>
<Note fill type="error" action={actionSnip}>Error information.</Note>
```

### Pagination

**Exports:**
- `Pagination` - Pagination component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Pagination } from 'kampsy-ui';

const prev = {
  title: 'Home',
  href: '#',
};

const next = {
  title: 'Introduction',
  href: '#',
};

<Pagination previous={prev} {next} />
```

### Progress

**Exports:**
- `Progress` - Progress bar component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Progress } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic progress
<Progress value={80} />

// Dynamic
let dynamic = $state(50);
<Progress value={dynamic} />

// Themed
<Progress type="success" value={100} />
<Progress type="error" value={10} />
<Progress type="warning" value={40} />
<Progress type="secondary" value={70} />
```

### ProjectBanner

**Exports:**
- `ProjectBanner` - Project banner component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { ProjectBanner, Tooltip } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { ShieldCheck, RotateCounterClockWise, Warning } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

// Success variant
<ProjectBanner
  icon={ShieldCheck}
  callToAction={{
    label: 'Disable',
    href: '/project-banner'
  }}
  label="Attack Challenge Mode is enabled for this project"
  variant="success"
/>

// Warning variant with snippet
{#snippet labelSnip()}
  This project was rolled back by
  <Tooltip text="Yesterday for project marketing-website">
    @johnphamous
  </Tooltip>
{/snippet}
<ProjectBanner
  icon={RotateCounterClockWise}
  callToAction={{
    label: 'Undo Rollback',
    onClick: () => alert('Button clicked')
  }}
  label={labelSnip}
  variant="warning"
/>

// Error variant
<ProjectBanner
  icon={Warning}
  callToAction={{
    label: 'Add Credit Card',
    href: '/project-banner'
  }}
  label="Payment failed, update credit card information before your account is shut down"
  variant="error"
/>
```

### Radio

**Exports:**
- `Radio` - Radio button component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Radio } from 'kampsy-ui';
```

### Select

**Exports:**
- `Select.Root` - Root select container
- `Select.Trigger` - Select trigger button
- `Select.Value` - Selected value display
- `Select.Content` - Select dropdown content
- `Select.Item` - Select option item

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Select } from 'kampsy-ui';

let value = $state('');

// Basic select
<Select.Root bind:value class="w-full lg:w-auto">
  <Select.Trigger class="w-full lg:w-[200px]">
    <Select.Value placeholder="select a fruit" />
  </Select.Trigger>
  <Select.Content>
    <Select.Item value="apple">apple</Select.Item>
    <Select.Item value="banana">banana</Select.Item>
    <Select.Item value="orange">orange</Select.Item>
    <Select.Item value="pineapple">pineapple</Select.Item>
  </Select.Content>
</Select.Root>

// Sizes
<Select.Root size="small" bind:value>...</Select.Root>
<Select.Root bind:value>...</Select.Root> <!-- medium default -->
<Select.Root size="large" bind:value>...</Select.Root>

// With error
let error = $state('Please select a value.');
<Select.Root bind:error bind:value>
  <Select.Trigger>
    <Select.Value placeholder="select a fruit" />
  </Select.Trigger>
  <Select.Content>
    <Select.Item value="apple">apple</Select.Item>
  </Select.Content>
</Select.Root>
```

### ShowMore

**Exports:**
- `ShowMore` - Show more/less toggle component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { ShowMore } from 'kampsy-ui';

let isActive = $state(false);

<ShowMore bind:isActive />
```

### Snippet

**Exports:**
- `CodeSnippet` - Code snippet display component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { CodeSnippet } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic snippet
<CodeSnippet text="npm init next-app" class="w-full lg:w-[300px]" />

// Inverted
<CodeSnippet type="inverted" text="npm init next-app" class="w-full lg:w-[300px]" />

// Multiline
<CodeSnippet text={['cd project', 'now']} class="w-full" />

// No prompt
<CodeSnippet prompt={false} text="npm init next-app" class="w-full lg:w-[300px]" />

// With copy callback
<CodeSnippet
  onCopy={() => alert('You copied the text!')}
  text="npm init next-app"
  class="w-full lg:w-[300px]"
/>

// Variants
<CodeSnippet type="success" text="npm init next-app" />
<CodeSnippet type="error" text="npm init next-app" />
<CodeSnippet type="warning" text="npm init next-app" />
```

### Spinner

**Exports:**
- `Spinner` - Loading spinner component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Spinner } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Default size
<Spinner />

// Custom sizes
<Spinner size={12} />
<Spinner size={32} />
<Spinner size={40} />
```

### SplitButton

**Exports:**
- `SplitButton.Root` - Root split button container
- `SplitButton.Button` - Main button
- `SplitButton.Content` - Dropdown content
- `SplitButton.Item` - Dropdown item

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { SplitButton } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic split button
<SplitButton.Root>
  <SplitButton.Button onclick={() => alert('Clicked save')} size="medium">save</SplitButton.Button>
  <SplitButton.Content class="w-[264px]">
    <SplitButton.Item
      onClick={() => alert('Clicked save')}
      title="Save"
      description="Save changes"
    />
    <SplitButton.Item
      onClick={() => alert('Clicked save + Redeploy')}
      title="Save + Redeploy"
      description="Save changes and create a new production deployment"
    />
  </SplitButton.Content>
</SplitButton.Root>

// Sizes: small, medium, large
<SplitButton.Button size="small">save</SplitButton.Button>
<SplitButton.Button size="large">save</SplitButton.Button>

// Types: primary, secondary, tertiary, error, warning
<SplitButton.Button type="secondary">save</SplitButton.Button>
<SplitButton.Button type="error">save</SplitButton.Button>

// Alignment
<SplitButton.Root alignment="right">
  <SplitButton.Button>save</SplitButton.Button>
  <SplitButton.Content>...</SplitButton.Content>
</SplitButton.Root>
```

### StatusDot

**Exports:**
- `StatusDot` - Status indicator dot component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { StatusDot } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic status dot
<StatusDot state="QUEUED" />
<StatusDot state="BUILDING" />
<StatusDot state="ERROR" />
<StatusDot state="READY" />
<StatusDot state="CANCELED" />

// With label
<StatusDot label state="QUEUED" />
<StatusDot label state="READY" />
```

### Switch

**Exports:**
- `Switch.Root` - Root switch container
- `Switch.Control` - Switch control component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Switch, Tooltip } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { GridSquare, ListUnordered } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

let value = $state('');

// Basic switch
<Switch.Root bind:value name="default">
  <Switch.Control defaultChecked label="Source" value="source" />
  <Switch.Control label="Output" value="output" />
</Switch.Root>

// Disabled
<Switch.Root bind:value name="default">
  <Switch.Control defaultChecked disabled label="Source" value="source" />
  <Switch.Control disabled label="Output" value="output" />
</Switch.Root>

// Sizes: small, medium (default), large
<Switch.Root bind:value name="size-small" size="small">...</Switch.Root>
<Switch.Root bind:value name="size-large" size="large">...</Switch.Root>

// Full width
<Switch.Root bind:value name="size-large" size="large" fullWidth>...</Switch.Root>

// With tooltip
<Switch.Root bind:value>
  <Tooltip text="View Source">
    <Switch.Control defaultChecked label="Source" value="source" />
  </Tooltip>
  <Tooltip text="View Output">
    <Switch.Control label="Output" value="output" />
  </Tooltip>
</Switch.Root>

// With icons
<Switch.Root bind:value name="size-small" size="small">
  <Switch.Control defaultChecked icon={GridSquare} value="source" />
  <Switch.Control icon={ListUnordered} value="output" />
</Switch.Root>
```

### Table

**Exports:**
- `Table.Root` - Root table container
- `Table.Caption` - Table caption
- `Table.Colgroup` - Column group
- `Table.Col` - Column definition
- `Table.Header` - Table header section
- `Table.Head` - Table head row
- `Table.Row` - Table row
- `Table.Cell` - Table cell
- `Table.Body` - Table body section
- `Table.Footer` - Table footer

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Table } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic table
<Table.Root>
  <Table.Header>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Head>Col 1</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Col 2</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Col 3</Table.Head>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Header>
  <Table.Body>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell>Value 1.1</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Value 1.2</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell>Value 1.3</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Body>
</Table.Root>

// Striped rows
<Table.Body striped>
  <Table.Row>...</Table.Row>
</Table.Body>

// Interactive rows
<Table.Body interactive>
  <Table.Row>...</Table.Row>
</Table.Body>

// Full table with colgroup, footer
<Table.Root>
  <Table.Colgroup>
    <Table.Col class="w-[44%]" />
    <Table.Col class="w-[22%]" />
    <Table.Col class="w-[22%]" />
    <Table.Col class="w-[11%]" />
  </Table.Colgroup>
  <Table.Header>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Head>Product</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Usage</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Price</Table.Head>
      <Table.Head>Charge</Table.Head>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Header>
  <Table.Body interactive striped>
    {#each items as item}
      <Table.Row>
        <Table.Cell>{item.product}</Table.Cell>
        <Table.Cell>{item.usage}</Table.Cell>
        <Table.Cell>{item.price}</Table.Cell>
        <Table.Cell>{formatCurrency(item.charge)}</Table.Cell>
      </Table.Row>
    {/each}
  </Table.Body>
  <Table.Footer>
    <Table.Row>
      <Table.Cell class="text-gray-1000 font-medium">Subtotal</Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell></Table.Cell>
      <Table.Cell class="text-gray-1000 font-medium">{total}</Table.Cell>
    </Table.Row>
  </Table.Footer>
</Table.Root>
```

### Tabs

**Exports:**
- `Tabs` - Tabs component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Tabs } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { LogoGithub, LogoGitlab, LogoBitbucketColor } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

let selected = $state('apple');

// Basic tabs
<Tabs
  bind:selected
  tabs={[
    { title: 'Apple', value: 'apple' },
    { title: 'Orange', value: 'orange' },
    { title: 'Mango', value: 'mango' }
  ]}
/>

// Disabled
<Tabs
  disabled
  bind:selected
  tabs={[...]}
/>

// Disabled specific tab
<Tabs
  bind:selected
  tabs={[
    { title: 'Apple', value: 'apple' },
    { title: 'Orange', value: 'orange' },
    { title: 'Mango', value: 'mango', disabled: true, tooltip: 'Mangos are not allowed' }
  ]}
/>

// With icons
<Tabs
  bind:selected
  tabs={[
    { title: 'Github', value: 'github', icon: LogoGithub },
    { title: 'Gitlab', value: 'gitlab', icon: LogoGitlab },
    { title: 'Bitbucket', value: 'bitbucket', icon: LogoBitbucketColor }
  ]}
/>

// Secondary type
<Tabs
  bind:selected
  tabs={[...]}
  type="secondary"
/>
```

### Text

**Exports:**
- `Text` - Text component
- `TextGradient` - Gradient text component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Text, TextGradient } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Sizes (numeric)
<Text size={48}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>
<Text size={32}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>
<Text size={24}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>
<Text size={16}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>
<Text size={14}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>
<Text size={12}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>

// Responsive size
<Text size={{ sm: 24, md: 32, lg: 48 }}>The Evil Rabbit jumps.</Text>

// Variants
<Text variant="heading-72">Heading 72</Text>
<Text variant="heading-48">Heading 48</Text>
<Text variant="heading-32">Heading 32</Text>
<Text variant="heading-24">Heading 24</Text>
<Text variant="copy-20">Copy 20</Text>
<Text variant="copy-16">Copy 16</Text>
<Text variant="copy-14">Copy 14</Text>
<Text variant="label-16">Label 16</Text>
<Text variant="label-14">Label 14</Text>
<Text variant="button-16">Button 16</Text>
<Text variant="button-14">Button 14</Text>

// Responsive variant
<Text variant={{ sm: 'heading-24', md: 'heading-32', lg: 'heading-48' }}>
  Responsive Heading
</Text>

// Modifiers
<Text size={16}>
  The <strong>Evil Rabbit</strong> <em>jumps</em>
  over the <s>quick brown fox</s> <u>Lawful Meerkat</u>.
</Text>

// Truncate
<Text size={16} class="max-w-[100px]" truncate>
  The Evil Rabbit jumps.
</Text>
```

### Textarea

**Exports:**
- `Textarea` - Textarea input component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Textarea } from 'kampsy-ui';

let value = $state('');

// Basic textarea
<Textarea
  bind:value
  placeholder="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet..."
/>

// Disabled
<Textarea bind:value disabled placeholder="..." />

// With label
<Textarea
  bind:value
  label="Label"
  placeholder="..."
/>

// With error
<Textarea
  bind:value
  error="There has been an error."
  size="medium"
/>

// Sizes: tiny, small, medium (default), large
<Textarea bind:value size="tiny" />
<Textarea bind:value size="small" />
<Textarea bind:value size="large" />
```

### ThemeSwitcher

**Exports:**
- `ThemeSwitcher` - Theme switcher component (light/dark mode)

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { ThemeSwitcher } from 'kampsy-ui';

<ThemeSwitcher />
```

### Toggle

**Exports:**
- `Toggle` - Toggle button component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Toggle } from 'kampsy-ui';
import { LockClosedSmall, LockOpenSmall } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';

let checked = $state(false);

// Basic toggle
<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" bind:checked />

// Sizes
<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" checked={false} />
<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" checked={false} size="large" />

// Custom colors with icons
<Toggle
  aria-label="Enable Firewall"
  bind:checked
  color="purple"
  icon={{
    checked: LockClosedSmall,
    unchecked: LockOpenSmall
  }}
/>

// Colors: purple, amber, red, pink, green, teal
<Toggle bind:checked color="amber" icon={{...}} />
<Toggle bind:checked color="red" icon={{...}} />

// With label
<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" bind:checked>Enable Firewall</Toggle>

// Switch first (label before toggle)
<Toggle aria-label="Enable Firewall" bind:checked direction="switch-first">
  Enable Firewall
</Toggle>
```

### Tooltip

**Exports:**
- `Tooltip` - Tooltip component

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { Tooltip, Button, Spinner, Badge } from 'kampsy-ui';

// Basic tooltip with positions
<Tooltip text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence" position="top">
  <span>Top</span>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence" position="bottom">
  <span>Bottom</span>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence" position="right">
  <span>Right</span>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence" position="left">
  <span>Left</span>
</Tooltip>

// Custom types
<Tooltip text="..." position="top" type="success">...</Tooltip>
<Tooltip text="..." position="bottom" type="error">...</Tooltip>
<Tooltip text="..." position="right" type="warning">...</Tooltip>
<Tooltip text="..." position="left" type="violet">...</Tooltip>

// With components
<Tooltip position="bottom" text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence">
  <Button size="small">Bottom</Button>
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip position="right" text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence">
  <Spinner />
</Tooltip>
<Tooltip position="left" text="The Evil Rabbit Jumped over the Fence">
  <Badge size="sm">LEFT</Badge>
</Tooltip>
```

## Icons

Icons are available from the `kampsy-ui/icons` export:

**Available Icons:**
- `ArrowLeft`, `ArrowRight`, `ArrowCircleUp`, `ArrowUp`, `ArrowUpRight`
- `ChevronLeft`, `ChevronLeftSmall`, `ChevronRight`, `ChevronRightSmall`, `ChevronUpSmall`, `ChevronDown`, `ChevronDownSmall`
- `Moon`, `Sun`
- `Shield`, `ShieldGlobe`, `ShieldCheck`
- `Error`, `LoaderCircle`
- `GridSquare`, `ListUnordered`
- `Check`, `CheckSquare`, `CheckSquareFill`, `CheckCircle`
- `Hook`, `Webhook`
- `InformationFillSmall`, `Information`
- `RotateCounterClockWise`
- `UserPlus`
- `Warning`
- `LogoFacebook`, `LogoTwitterX`, `LogoTwitterXSmall`, `LogoGithub`, `LogoGitlab`, `LogoBitbucketColor`, `LogoSlackColor`, `LogoGeist`
- `MagnifyingGlass`
- `LockClosed`, `LockOpen`, `LockClosedSmall`, `LockOpenSmall`
- `MoreHorizontal`
- `Accessibility`
- `MenuAlt`
- `Cross`
- `Star`, `StarFill`
- `Minus`
- `Link`, `LinkExternal`
- `ChartBarPeak`
- `Copy`
- `Calendar`
- `Asterisk`
- `Cpu`
- `DeviceAlternate`

**Usage:**
```svelte
import { ArrowLeft, Check, Error } from 'kampsy-ui/icons';
```

## Types

**Exports:**
- `DateValue` - Type: `Date | string`
- `RangeValue<T>` - Interface with `start: T` and `end: T` properties

**Usage:**
```svelte
import type { DateValue, RangeValue } from 'kampsy-ui';
```

## Preset

Preset configurations are available from the `kampsy-ui/preset` export.

**Usage:**
```javascript
import preset from 'kampsy-ui/preset';
```

## Styling

The library uses Tailwind CSS with custom color tokens:
- Light mode: `kui-light-*` prefixes
- Dark mode: `kui-dark-*` prefixes
- Colors include: `bg`, `gray`, `blue`, `purple`, `amber`, `red`, `pink`, `green`, `teal`

## Component Patterns

### Compound Components

Many components follow a compound component pattern where a root component contains sub-components:
- `Modal.*` - Modal components
- `Select.*` - Select components
- `Table.*` - Table components
- `Menu.*` - Menu components
- `Collapse.*` - Collapse components
- `SplitButton.*` - Split button components
- `Switch.*` - Switch components
- `Kbd.*` - Keyboard input components
- `Choicebox.*` - Choicebox components
- `EmptyState.*` - Empty state components
- `AvatarText.*` - Avatar text components

### Snippet-based Components

Components use Svelte 5's snippet pattern for children:
```svelte
<Button>
  {#snippet children()}
    Click me
  {/snippet}
</Button>
```

### Bindable Props

Many components support bindable props for two-way data binding:
- `Input.value` - Bindable string
- `Button.buttonElement` - Bindable HTMLButtonElement reference

## Framework Requirements

- **Svelte**: ^5.0.0-next.1 (peer dependency)
- Uses Svelte 5 runes (`$props()`, `$state()`, `$derived()`, `$bindable()`)
- Uses Svelte 5 snippets for children

## Documentation

Visit http://ui.kampsy.xyz for full documentation and examples.

MIT License
